job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: <strong><u>Job Summary<br><br></u></strong>Randstad is seeking a Software Engineer with experience in Aerospace or the Automotive industry to support the Embedded development of a state-of-the-art alternative fuel Aircraft Propulsion System. You will work with a diverse international team and head up the design and development of the Control Systems. Your work will truly revolutionize air transportation across North America and Europe.<br><br>location: Everett, Washington<br>job type: Permanent<br>salary: $135,000 - 145,000 per year<br>work hours: 8am to 4pm<br>education: Bachelors<br><br><strong><u>Responsibilities<br></u></strong><ul> <li>Select appropriate HW/SW platforms and architectures to achieve real-time data acquisition and control of complex systems including Propulsion system, power management, and safety features</li><li>Develop embedded code to perform system telemetry and control for these complex systems in real-time (&lt; microseconds)</li><li>Develop assorted software for a variety of subsystem test stands</li><li>Develop database and post processing software to support system troubleshooting, development and analysis</li><li>Be able and willing to build or adapt new software development environments as needed.</li><li>Create graphical user interfaces for real time system telemetry and control panels</li><li>Maintain high quality documentation of code base and architectures</li><li>Help build our software engineering team as we grow<br><br></li></ul><strong><u>Requirements<br></u></strong><ul> <li>Demonstrated self-starter / learning related to software and firmware</li><li>Experience with relevant computer programming languages such as C/C++, Python</li><li>Hands-on experience coding and testing prototype systems</li><li>Ability to plan projects and be accountable for deliverables &amp; schedules</li><li>Proficiency in DO178C or ISO 26262 and applicable standard for Software Life Cycle</li><li>Proficiency in multi-application, multi-layer design , verification and implementation</li><li>Experience in Software in the loop and Hardware in the loop</li><li>Emphasis on real time high bandwidth control system theory, design, and implementation</li><li>Serial digital communication knowledge (UART, I2C, CAN, SPI)</li><li>Hands on experience with measurement and test equipment (oscilloscopes, DAQ's, etc)</li><li>Circuit design and PCB layout for mixed power/signal applications</li><li>Application/GUI programming</li><li>Experience with version control systems</li><li>Altium experience<br><br></li></ul><strong><u>Qualifications<br></u></strong><ul> <li>Experience level: Experienced</li><li>Minimum 5 years of experience</li><li>Education: Bachelors (required)<br><br></li></ul><strong><u>Skills<br></u></strong><ul><li>Embedded Software Full Lifecycle<br><br></li></ul>Equal Opportunity Employer: Race, Color, Religion, Sex, Sexual Orientation, Gender Identity, National Origin, Age, Genetic Information, Disability, Protected Veteran Status, or any other legally protected group status.<br><br>
